column4: does anyone know where the account details get saved for evolution? I need to transfer my evolution to another computer
i copied that across but my accounts are not there
i also copied across the .gnome2_private/evolution file
oh yeah.. that's right hold on, let me check something
it looks like it keeps it in gconf
ok i did that, still nothing, should i restart gnome?
yeah, and make sure gconfd shuts down too
they should really make it easier to migrate!
recreate them manually do you think?
still didn't work?? odd... yeah it looks like that is all you can do...
found the answer in #evolution on gimpnet
you have to stop the gconf daemon while copying and e-d-s too
ah.. makes sense.. I should have thought of that....
